Desc.eng: Oh, another human to ruin us. I have everything you might need! Fish skin coats, beard grease! Shovels, wooden sandals, explosives!
No, thank you. Is this the right way to the giant sphere corrupting your land?
Who cares? Buy something! Stolen mining equipment? Real cheap!
I need information, not your useless junk. Where is the Inkgrub?
You strut in your fancy gear and expect me to play along? After the scientists made us miserable?
I spit on you! You get nothing, not even my jellied eel pudding!
Donâ€™t kill him, Van Helsing. Just leave.
